==German== ===Etymology=== {{compound|de|wieder|t1=again|hören|t2=to hear}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈviːdɐˌhøːʁən/}} * {{hyphenation|de|Wie|der|hö|ren}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n||-}} # [[hear]]ing [[again]]; an instance of hearing someone’s or each other’s voice again ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|n=sg}} ===Interjection=== {{head|de|interjection}} # {{alternative form of|de|auf Wiederhören}} ===See also=== * {{l|de|Wiederschauen}}, {{l|de|auf Wiederschauen}} * {{l|de|Wiedersehen}}, {{l|de|auf Wiedersehen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Canoo}} * {{R:Duden}} * {{R:DWDS}} * {{R:UniLeipzig}}
